Cleveland.Monte Ahuja College of Business: The Monte Ahuja College of Business is the business school at Cleveland State University in Cleveland, Ohio. With more than 3,000 current students and over 19,000 alumni, the Monte Ahuja College of Business ranks among the largest in Ohio. It is fully accredited by the AACSB and currently offers the Bachelor of Business Administration (BBA) undergraduate degree with a number of majors and minors, six graduate degree programs, one dual graduate degree program and one doctoral degree program.
